question: Which state government has launched a housing loan subsidy scheme - Aponar Apon Ghar?
explanation: In Guwahati, the Assam Government has rolled out a housing loan subsidy scheme - Aponar Apon Ghar - where in financial relief will be provided towards purchase or construction of the first house for the family. The subsidy up to Rs 2.50 lakh will be provided for loan amounts from Â Rs 5 to Rs 40 Lakh. This move will boost the demand and led to the expansion of real estate in the state.
